page.title: 05SHOPPING CENTRE
page.content: In Preston Grange Shopping Centre there are-10 shops selling food and drink-two luxury goods shops-one newsagency-nine selling household goods-three clothes shops-nine offering specialist services two cafes one garage selling petrol and several car parks.Shoppers come mainly fom North Shields secondly Whitley Bay least from Seaton Delaval.Most shoppers come by car secondly walking and least by bus.Busiest day for Hintons and Presto supermarkets is Friday. Sugar is the most popular food sold at Hintons at Presto it is tinned beans.Presto employ 50 staff and have 8000 shoppers per week while Hintons employ 65 staff and have 8700 shoppers per week.Presto have 1 manager,1deputy manager,6 department heads,and 42 assistants.Hintons have 1 manager,1 deputy manager,5 section heads and 58 assistants.
